info.title: Able API
info.description: SDK for building integrations with Able.

put.summary:
Creates a new DocumentVersion. The DocumentVersion represents a document
from an external system that needs to be processed.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the extension.

documents.description: A list of documents to be added to the DocumentVersion.

schema.description: Request to create a new DocumentVersion.

put.summary:
Acquires a DocumentVersion task. The task represents a document to be
processed and once acquired, should be processed within the expected
execution time. If the task is not completed within the expected time,
it will be made available for acquisition by other workers.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the extension.

parameters.name: workerName
parameters.description: The name of the worker that will process the task.

put.summary:
Completes a DocumentVersion task. The task should be marked as complete
after successful processing or if an error occurs during processing. If
completed successfully, any extracted document attributes should be
included in the completion request.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the extension.

parameters.name: workerName
parameters.description: The name of the worker that processed the task.

parameters.name: documentVersionId
parameters.description: The ID of the document version that was processed.

expectedExecutionDuration.description: The expected amount of time for task execution.

documentVersionId.description: The ID of the document version.

externalPrimaryKey.description: The primary key of the document in the external system.

uploadUrl.description: The upload URL for the document file in GCS.

rawFileUrl.description: The download URL for the raw document file in GCS.

standardizedPdfUrl.description: The download URL for the standardized PDF file in GCS.

contentUrl.description: The download URL for the content file in GCS.

acquiredBy.description: The name of the worker that acquired the document version.

acquiredTime.description: The timestamp when the document version was acquired.

acquiredDuration.description: The expected amount of time for task execution.

v1AcquiredDocumentVersion.description: Represents a DocumentVersion that has been acquired for processing.

v1Attribute.description: Represents an attribute of a document.

v1AttributeType.description:
The data type of an attribute.

 - AUTO: Guess the attribute type based on its value.
 - STRING: Interpret the attribute as a string.
 - NUMBER: Interpret the attribute as a numeric value.

status.description: The status of the task after processing.

lastError.description:
Any error message generated during processing, empty if status is
COMPLETE.

attributes.description: Any attributes extracted from the document during processing.

documentVersionId.description: The ID of the document version.

status.description: The status of the task after processing.

lastError.description:
Any error message generated during processing, empty if status is
COMPLETE.

acquiredBy.description: The name of the worker that acquired the document version.

acquiredTime.description: The timestamp when the document version was acquired.

completedBy.description: The name of the worker that completed the document version.

completedTime.description: The timestamp when the document version was completed.

v1CompletedDocumentVersion.description: Represents a DocumentVersion that has been completed after processing.

v1DataTransferDirection.description:
Direction of data transfer.

 - TO_ABLE: Data is transfered from an external source to Able.
 - TO_EXTERNAL: Data is transfered from Able to an external source.

externalPrimaryKey.description: The primary key of the document in the external system.

v1Document.description: Represents a document to be added to a DocumentVersion.

externalPrimaryKey.description: The primary key of the document in the external system.

v1DocumentVersion.description: Represents a document version created for processing.

v1DocumentVersionStatus.description:
Status of processing a document version.

 - COMPLETE: Document processing has been successful.
 - ERROR: Document processing was not successful.
